about_the_game:
◆Caution◆


All text in this game has been translated by machine translation.



◆Story◆

Ahhhh ...... I'm so bored!"

　The main character, Shogo Nimura, was recently injured while working at a construction site and is currently at home
He is currently recuperating at home. Although the injury itself is long gone, he has lost the desire to work seriously.
I was spending every day taking a day off from work for any reason I could think of.

　One day, a new resident moves in next door.

"Who's that?　Minami-senpai?"
I'm ......!　Ni, Nimura ......
"Mimi?　Do you know him by any chance?
"Oh,......, ah,...... coy,......, no, he was my junior in school.

　The two are surprised at the sudden reunion. The first thing that comes to mind is the fact that the two of them are suddenly back together again.
The two of them are not the same person, but they are both very different people. After they return
Shogo's mind is still filled with the image of Mimi's ripe and wonderful body.

The first thing that comes to mind is the fact that the two of them are not only in the same room, but also in the same room together. The first thing that comes to mind when you think of Mimi is that she's a very nice and ripe body.
I want to taste that body.

　The next day, Shogo started to take action to get his hands on Mimi's body.



◆Character◆

Name: Minami Yoshioka
Height: 168 cm
Three sizes: B115/W62/H9 4
Blood type: O
Hobbies: Cooking, physical exercise
Pet peeve: Pussies, selfish people


※Japanese voice recording
※Male characters are not recorded



◆Game Specifications◆

・Novel game that can be read by clicking.
・Heroine full voice
・CG mode
・CG mode ・Scene recollection


◆Content Warning◆

This game contains content not suitable for all ages and
may not be suitable for display in the workplace.

The game contains nudity or sexual content, violence, sexual assault, sex without consent, and general adult content.
general adult content.

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Processor: 1+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound

  • Sound Card: Direct Sound

short_description: The strong-willed Mimi resists at first, but her body, which has recently been sexless, becomes more obedient. This is a novel adventure game in which you train her to beg you and dominate her mind and body.
supported_languages:
Japanese*, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
